response.overview: Jerry the mouse isn’t alone in his battle against the naughty cat Tom. In this collection of crazy adventures, you’ll meet other friends who join our famous duo for countless pranks, mishaps, and laugh-out-loud fun! Episodes: Down Beat Bear (O Urso Dançarino) Surf-Bored Cat (O Gato do Surf) Triplet Trouble (Problemas a Triplicar) The Bodyguard (O Guarda-Costas) The Bowling Alley-Cat (Bólingue Acidentado) The Flying Cat (O Gato Voador) The Little Orphan (O Pequeno Órfão) Saturday Evening Puss (O Gato de Sábado à Noite) Golf Puss (Golfe Para Dois)
response.title: Espectáculo Tom & Jerry 2: Volume 20
